attributes.additional_details:
This would help greatly with the housing problems
Some people can afford a mortgage on benefits but are unable to get one due to having to have a great credit report and a job earning 3 x more than the morgage or a guarantor 
Most people do not have this but can easily afford a mortgage which is alot cheaper than private rentals
attributes.background: To consider using benefits to get a mortgage

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about eligibility for mortgages are a matter for the mortgage provider, not the UK Government or Parliament.
